content.p: As part of Financial Control, the Treasury section has responsibility for the following areas: Cash Management Monitor bank balances, forecast cash flows to ensure sufficient short term funds for the University's activities Investments Short term cash investments and long term investment of endowment funds Relationship Management Building relationships with a portfolio of finance providers to obtain the best possible service at the best possible rate Financing Determining the level and timing of funding required in conjunction with the budget and 5 year plan and sourcing that funding Risk Management Interest Rate Risk - covering exposure to interest rate movements Exchange Rate Risk - covering exposure to foreign exchange rate movements Treasury Financial Control tel: (0115) 951 5677 fax: (0115) 951 5680 email: julie.mather@nottingham.ac.uk email list: Please see our contacts page
